{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Dome Fossil |image = [[File:Dome_Fossil.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Dome Fossil''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Dome Fossil''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When a '''Dome Fossil''' is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Kabuto. ==Mine Layout== The Dome Fossil appears in the Underground as a 5x4 sized object.

[[File:DomeFossilMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Dome_Fossil.png|30px]] || [[File:Kabuto.png|40px]] Kabuto |} ==Acquisition== Dome Fossils can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]]. There is also a 50% chance of receiving one after beating [[Mt. Moon]] for the first time.
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]] __NOTOC__
